answers.answer: I know that's right I'm so ready to have her already. I'm also 34 weeks as of today and I stay uncomfortable. I want her here so bad. I'm a ftm and this pregnancy has been hard for me.
Same here...i feel d same i m 37 weeks

Oh boy  fysuf I am jealous that your thst much closer, hehhe I'm about to be done with my 12 hour shift and my legs hurt and feet and ankles are so swollen and I have to come and so it all over again tonight and tomorrow night too...yuckie!

Me! Unfortunately I will be having my baby at 34 weeks though. Being sick and having a very high risk pregnancy made it go by really slow. My water broke saturday. So the next 3 1/2 weeks are going so slow unless he decides to come now...
Good luck to you and to your little one,hope everything will go well.I'm 34 weeks and i have preeclampsia also for me delivery can be any time.I just pray my baby to develop enough till there.
I'm 34 weeks also and I'm ready to see my daughter
I'm 32 weeks and ready to see my baby. Kinda nervous about the mucus plug coming out, water breaking, etc... being a first timer, excitement is overwhelming
Omg yes! I'll be 28 weeks this Saturday and I just said if feel like I've been pregnant FOREVER. With my oldest it zipped by.

I thought I would be really scared when my mucus plug came out and when my water broke but I didn't even have time to be nervous. The mom in me kicked in instantly to get me to the hospital right away being so early still. The only thing I'm nervous about it him being healthy coming at 34 weeks.

I'm so ready! I've been having back pains and I just have a feeling that today or tomorrow he's going to decide to come! I'm soo exited! I'm ready to be able to sleep on my back again! 37 weeks 3 days
I'm 37+4 and had a very rough pregnancy and am soooo ready for him to come! I've been really nervous about it recently as a ftm but bow I think my uncomfortableness is taking over my nervousness

question: Anyone else feel like they have been pregnant forever? I'm 34 weeks and I'm so uncomfortable...I feel like I've been pregnant forever and I still have 6 weeks to go! I'm excited to meet my little man but I am so tired of being pregnant!
title: ready to deliver already
